name: Bin Ball! - Recycling Game
description:
" A short and silly android game where you learn to recyle while spinning around in amusing ways! "

This project was crafted while learning how to deal with Google Cloud Services and Android shipping within Unreal Engine 4.

The game plays using your smartphone's gyroscope sensors and touch screen. Spin around to aim and click on the screen to shoot garbage into it's proper place. It is advised to play standing as if you were controlling a head mounted display.

Hi-Score, Leaderboards and Achievements implemented. We sincerely hope you like it and thank you for playing, have fun recycling!

· Game Design/Level Design and UI: Adrian Iglesias Adrover (Linkedin)

· Gameplay and Systems Programming: Francisco Javier Pascual Vidal (Linkedin)

· 3D Modeling and Texturing: Santiago Adrio Nieto
